records.Name: Slack Post
records.Sample_Prompt__c:
Slack Post or Thread
The content you are creating is meant to summarize the following text. The summary must consist of a bulleted list. The text is:

[insert Slack post/thread here]

records.Name: Error Logs
records.Sample_Prompt__c: Use the data from the following error logs to explain why I'm encounter the error in a plain language. Avoid technical language or provide an example of what was going wrong in the process in order to produce this error.

records.Name: What Salesforce Design System component should I use?
records.Sample_Prompt__c: The content you are creating is meant to answer the following question. The content must be a short response to the question asked using declarative statements in second person. If you are unsure, be honest and state “I do not know.” The question is: Based on the Salesforce Design System, what component should I use to [explain here]?
